dct_alternative_sm: Rdo. Dno. D. Adr. Stalpartio Abb. togerlesi digniso. d. Lumen historiarum per orientem illustrandis Biblijs sacris, martyrologis, e alijs multis
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, vegetation, drainage, boundaries, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text surrounding map: Loca orientis in Bibliis sacris martyrologio...
2 inset maps: Typus orbis ad inuestigadum Ophir -- Judaeae amplior descriptio.
Appears in Abrahamii Ortelii theatri orbis terrarum parergon. Antverpiae, 1624.
